review.name: I'm a Chinese.I evaluate the vedio in my thought.
review.reviewBody: In fact,many chinese young people didn't know 64shijian(Chinese word).We search 64 in Baidu(the biggest tools like google in our country),the page jump to another content.The first time I heard 6.4 is in middle school.I'm 12 that time.My classmate's father attended the activity(not in Beijing) .Last year,my uncle talked with his friend when was driving car.He said,nearly all people who attend the 1989 was punished.They won't be trusted.Many company refused to accept them.Yes,it's real. However,the concludsions about farmers in vedio are wrong.The goverment pay much attention to education.To tell the truth,if some one want to go to school,most families can afford it!It's cheap to go to school. It's also not real about workers.13hours/Day?no hoilday?Nonexistent!At that time,my parents worked 8hours a day.Thay can get one day to have a rest per week.Sometimes,they need to work over time,but they could get extra money. Maybe we don't have enough democracy,but I'm OK!
